hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select * from trans where date_trans between to_date(:sDate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') and to_date(:eDate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')

select t.*,trans.DATE_TRANS from( select * from (select RECEIPTNO_SALESITEM receipt, ITEM_SALESITEM name1,AMOUNT_SALESITEM amount from SALESITEM where RECEIPTNO_SALESITEM ='20170702001914876') union (select receiptno_salesdiscount receipt,name_salesdiscount name1,amount_salesdiscount amount from salesDiscount where receiptno_salesdiscount ='20170702001914876') union (select receiptno_salesless receipt,name_salesless name1,amount_salesless amount from salesless where receiptno_salesless='20170702001914876') ) t,trans where trans.RECEIPTNO_TRANS='20170702001914876';
